outputs.output_descr:

2. Public Information:

Communications used as a key instrument to raise awareness and encourage dialogue about the future of Cyprus

Mainstreaming and knowledge of conflict prevention and peace building in Cyprus

The Cyprus Community Media Centre (CCMC) aims to enhance relationships between the mass media and civil society through the provision of community media generated products contributing to reconciliation and diversity.

The collaborative media initiative will be under the auspices of the Cyprus Community Media Centre (CCMC) which represents a consortium of 26 local CSO's from both the Greek Cypriot and Turkish Cypriot communities. 

The principle objective of this project is to further contribute to the aims of the CCMC and its work with the media by laying the foundations for the development of a collaborative media platform in Cyprus.
outputs.output_title: Dem. Gov. Them Trust Fund CCMC
